Texts.Chs: 恭喜你，开赴骑士！你的开赴机车现在已经准备好在任何时候被您召唤，快去尽情兜风吧，我的朋友！
Texts.Eng: Congratulations, Keffrider! Your Keff is now ready to be summoned at any time, so go and ride, my friend!

Texts.Chs: 那扇^orange;座乘跃迁门^white;可以把你的开赴机车从船上的货舱运到战场,但如果你不能远程控制它，它就没用了。用^green;我给你的^orange;阿威坎发射器^green;为自己做个^orange;跃迁门控制器^white;，之后骑上自己的开赴机车驰骋吧！
Texts.Eng: That ^orange;Vehicle Jumpgate^white; can transport your Keff from your ship's cargo hold to the field, but it's useless if you can't remotely control it. ^green;Build yourself a ^orange;Jumpgate Controller^green; using the ^orange;Avikan Transmitter^green; I gave you^white;, and you'll be ready to ride your very own Keff!
